LanguageData.PRF_Shearer.label: 털 깎는 기계
LanguageData.PRF_Shearer.description: A station with motion-detecting industrial-size shearing clippers. Swiftly and automatically extracts wool from your colony's animals.\n\nKeep it stocked with food to lure the animals in for processing. Drops the produce where the sheared creature is standing.
LanguageData.PRF_Milker.label: 착유기
LanguageData.PRF_Milker.description: 농장 동물의 젖을 짜기 위해 유선을 찾는 보조 동력 튜브가 장착된 스테이션입니다.\n\n진행을 위해 동물을 끌어들이기 위한 음식과 함께 보관하세요. 착유된 동물이 서 있는 곳에 생산물을 떨어뜨립니다.
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester.label: 일반 동물 수확기
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester.description: 더욱 이국적인 종으로부터 모든 종류의 동물성 제품을 부드럽게 추출할 수 있는 다양한 도구를 갖춘 정교한 시설입니다.\n\n진행을 위해 동물을 끌어들이기 위한 음식과 함께 보관하세요. 동물이 서 있는 곳에 생산물을 떨어뜨립니다.
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester_II.label: 첨단 동물 수확기
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester_II.descriptio: This is an advanced animal harvester that can harvest a wide range of products from animals, it has a front-facing pull zone that can be made larger with a power booster. If RimFridge is installed it will cool food to keep it from spoiling over time.
LanguageData.PRF_Slaughterhouse.label: advanced slaughterhouse
LanguageData.PRF_Slaughterhouse.description: A state-of-the-art robotic slaughterhouse designed to harvest meat and other animal products from living animals. It will cut and collect with great precision and will deliver the final product after finishing its task.
LanguageData.PRF_RecipeDatabase.label: portable recipe database
LanguageData.PRF_RecipeDatabase.description:
A portable storage device that can duplicate and transfer bills and recipes from worktables to assemblers. Uploaded recipes and bills will be automatically lost if the portable database is either moved or destroyed.

The white cells represent the import range for the database.

I wonder what all these other buttons do...
LanguageData.PRF_TypeOneAssembler_I.label: 조립기
LanguageData.PRF_TypeOneAssembler_I.description:
An automatic assembler controlled by a computer. Despite being called an assembler, it's also capable of simpler procedures such as cutting stone blocks, and refinery work.

Downloads recipes from an adjacent recipe database.

The white cells represent the input range; the blue cells represent the database range, and the yellow cell represents the output.
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_I.label: 적응형 조립기
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_I.description:
An automatic assembler controlled by a primitive AI.

The simple artificial neural network enables it to learn, to be more precise and efficient at individual recipes. Slowly overwrites currently unused recipe algorithms, as it has limited processing and memory capacity.

Downloads recipes from an adjacent recipe database.

The white cells represent the input range; the blue cells represent the database range, and the yellow cell represents the output.
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_II.label: quantum assembler (prime)
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_II.description: This assembler is an upgraded version that works very slowly, but it starts at normal quality instead of awful and so will ramp up faster. It also has a huge database input range.\n\nThe white cells represent the input range; the blue cells represent the database range, and the yellow cell represents the output.
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_III.label: quantum assembler (overclocked)
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_III.description: A high-end assembler that works at a high rate starts faster and can ramp up higher than other assemblers. The output isn't very good quality though. The database input range is huge.\n\nThe white cells represent the input range; the blue cells represent the database range, and the yellow cell represents the output.
LanguageData.PRF_4k_Battery.label: 4k 축전지
LanguageData.PRF_4k_Battery.description: A battery capable of storing 4,000 watt-days of power, equivalent to almost seven ordinary batteries. This battery is 50% efficient and will explode if exposed to rain.
LanguageData.PRF_16k_Battery.label: 16k 축전지
LanguageData.PRF_16k_Battery.description: A battery capable of storing 16,000 watt-days of power, equivalent to almost twenty-seven ordinary batteries. This battery is 50% efficient and will explode if exposed to rain.
LanguageData.PRF_64k_Battery.label: 64k 축전지
LanguageData.PRF_64k_Battery.description: 64,000와트-일의 전력을 저장할 수 있는 우수한 축전지입니다. 이 견고한 장치는 90%의 효율과 방수 기능을 갖추고 있어 외부에 보관할 수 있지만, 두 번 생각하고 싶을 만큼 비싸긴 합니다.
LanguageData.PRF_256k_Battery.label: 256k 축전지
LanguageData.PRF_256k_Battery.description: A tremendously powerful battery capable of storing 256,000 watt-days of power. The integrated AI management system reduces inefficiency losses to effectively zero, and the device is waterproof and will never break down, and it's surprisingly beautiful to look at. Watch out for short-circuits though!
LanguageData.PRF_ResearchTerminal.label: 공장 연구 단말
LanguageData.PRF_ResearchTerminal.description: Similar to a multi-analyzer, this device links to high-tech research benches, but with some additional capabilities.\nIt works as a simple research table and can research any research that does not require a high-tech research bench itself.\nIn addition to boosting research speed, this terminal is required for certain high-end factory research.
LanguageData.TableRoboticMachining.label: robotic machining table
LanguageData.TableRoboticMachining.description: A workstation for creating parts, frames, and more for automation buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerI.label: 공업용 조리기
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerI.description:
An industrial-grade cooker capable of steadily cooking meals for your colonists. Requires electricity and raw ingredients to operate.

Never ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go!

Only cooks simple foods but with a cooking level of 8 at 1x speed.

The white cells represent the input range, and the yellow cell represents the output.
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerII.label: modern auto-cooker
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerII.description:
An improved assortment of food processing modules that can peel, mince, chop, mix, cook, steam, grill, and bake ingredients into more or less delicious meals and other edible products.

Never ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go!

Copies electric stove recipes at 1.5x speed, with a cooking level of 12.
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerIII.label: 우주 조리기
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerIII.description: An advanced assortment of food processing modules that can peel, mince, chop, mix, cook, steam, grill, and bake ingredients into more or less delicious meals and other edible products.\n\nNever ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go! Cooks at 2x speed with a cooking skill of 20.
LanguageData.PRF_MeatGrinder.label: 육류 분쇄기
LanguageData.PRF_MeatGrinder.description: 시체를 육류, 가죽 등 사용 가능한 재료 더미로 가공하는 정밀 분쇄기.
LanguageData.PRF_FermentingBarrel.label: 발효 탱크
LanguageData.PRF_FermentingBarrel.description: A fully automated tank for fermenting alcoholic beverages. It self-regulates temperature to maintain the best quality.
LanguageData.PRF_SelfPrepper.label: 산업용 식품 가공기
LanguageData.PRF_SelfPrepper.description: 생 음식 자원을 조리 및 양조에 더 적합한 재료로 끓이거나 갈거나 분쇄하도록 설계된 기계.
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_I.label: drone cultivator
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_I.description: The first automated cultivator, this device utilizes simple drones to sow, water, and harvest your crops. It is slow but still represents a good first step into automated farming.
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II.label: drone cultivator Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II.description: The Mark II automated cultivator. By using improved drones to do your agriculture jobs, the functionality of automated farming operations is greatly improved. The drones will haul to a stockpile, I/O, or crate if it's within range.
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II_sun.label: drone cultivator Mk.II (sun lamp)
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II_sun.description: The Mark II automated cultivator. By using improved drones to do your agriculture jobs, the functionality of automated farming operations is greatly improved. The drones will haul to a stockpile, I/O, or crate if it's within range. This version includes an integrated sun lamp, and with specialized research can upgrade the included drones to level 20.
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_III.label: drone cultivator Mk.III
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_III.description: The Mark III automated cultivator. With the use of extremely advanced automated drones, this device can take your farming operations to the next level. The included drones will haul to a stockpile, I/O, or crate if it is within range.
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_I.label: nano cultivator
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_I.description: An alternative form of high-tech cultivator that houses worker mechanites instead of drones. The mechanites can sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It will also output onto a cell for further processing.
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Sun.label: nano cultivator (sun lamp)
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Sun.description: An alternative form of the high-tech cultivator that houses worker mechanites instead of drones. The mechanites can sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It will also output onto a cell for further processing. This model has an integrated sun lamp.
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Xl.label: nano cultivator Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Xl.description: A highly advanced XL cultivator that houses worker mechanites instead of drones. The included mechanites will sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It will also output onto a cell for further processing.
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_I.label: 스프링클러
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_I.description: 식물에 물을 주고 라운드당 1시간씩 성장을 증가시키는 작은 스프링클러. 효과도 중첩 가능!
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_II.label: 스프링쿨러 Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_II.description: An upgraded sprinkler using advanced AI to calculate and distribute the fertilizer needs of each plant in each sprinkle, optimizing the growth rate of every plant. Affected plants have their growth increased by two hours per round. Effects are stackable.
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelper.label: workshop drone station
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelper.description: A mini workshop helper capable of hauling, flicking, firefighting, and cleaning your workshop within a configurable range. Longer ranges will require more power.
LanguageData.PRF_MiniDroneColumn.label: 드론 기둥
LanguageData.PRF_MiniDroneColumn.description: A column filled with 2 handy drones that can clean your throneroom or eating hall, put out fires, refuel your braziers, and move your stuff away from the floor. It's also capable of holding up a roof and looks quite nice.
LanguageData.PRF_StoneWorks.label: industrial automatic mason
LanguageData.PRF_StoneWorks.description: 자동 CNC 라우터와 유사한 자동화 장치로, 석재를 벽돌로 가공하거나 심지어 합리적인 모양의 예술품을 만들 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.PRF_Recycler.label: smart recycler
LanguageData.PRF_Recycler.description: 거의 모든 의복이나 무기를 사용 가능한 자원으로 바꾸는 재활용 장치입니다. 하지만 일부 재료는 처리 과정에서 손실됩니다.
LanguageData.PRF_MrTsArtMachine.label: Thornsworth's art machine
LanguageData.PRF_MrTsArtMachine.description: Thornsworth's art machine, capable of producing art with an art level of 14.\nThorny had a big passion for 3D printers and producing art with his large army of assemblers. He made this machine before he passed away, and now it's finally here to produce an army of sculptures well into the future.\nRIP Thornsworth 2020.
LanguageData.PRF_MetalRefinery.label: metal refinery
LanguageData.PRF_MetalRefinery.description: 폴리머 라미네이션을 통해 희소금속을 생산할 수 있는 금속 정제소.
LanguageData.PRF_PartAssembler.label: basic assembler
LanguageData.PRF_PartAssembler.description: This is a preset assembler that creates parts for further production such as components, PRF parts, and more.
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceI.label: blast furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceI.description:
A simple early-stage furnace with minimal automation. It burns unwanted apparel and smelts raw resources into useful materials.

Automatically takes input materials (or trash) within the white cells surrounding the furnace - it has an input range of one cell - and outputs (yellow cell) any finished metals into a cell you may specify.
(Remember to remove quickly so it doesn't clog up.)
Uses wood as fuel to smelt.
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceII.label: industrial furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceII.description: This second, more advanced, furnace is an advanced industrial device capable of burning items and smelting raw resources into useful materials.\nRequires both fuel and electricity, though it's more efficient than the earlier furnace.
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceIII.label: advanced furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceIII.description:
An advanced furnace capable of burning stuff and smelting raw resources into useful materials significantly faster than the previous versions.

(This furnace is the best and fastest in Project RimFactory.)

Imports any recipe from the electric smelter and the crematorium.
LanguageData.PRF_FuelingMachine.label: fueling dispenser
LanguageData.PRF_FuelingMachine.description:
발전기, 화로, 박격포 및 일반 연료/박격포에 사용하는 기타 모든 것을 주유할 수 있는 간단한 주유 기계입니다.
흰색 셀에 있는 모든 것을 잡아당겨 앞에 있는 것에 연료를 공급합니다.

("재보급 가능"한 건물과 작동합니다 예로 SOS, CE.)
LanguageData.PRF_SmartHopper.label: 스마트 투입구
LanguageData.PRF_SmartHopper.description: An intelligent hopper that gathers objects within its input range (white cells). It can be toggled to only gather items in stockpiles. Does not push objects elsewhere, only gathers them, and will also grab from nearby belts. This device is unrelated to a nutrient dispenser hopper and does not interface with a nutrient dispenser.
LanguageData.PRF_GrowzonePuller_I.label: 재배구역 배출기
LanguageData.PRF_GrowzonePuller_I.description: 인접한 재배 구역에서 끌어오는 특수 흡입기입니다. 제대로 작동하려면 재배 영역에 연결되어 있어야 합니다.
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_I.label: item puller Mk.I
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_I.description: A device that pulls items from the input (white cell) and pushes them to the output (yellow cell). Turn it on after setting the filters.\nThis device is very flexible in its connections and works with stockpiles, storage, belts (all versions), I/O, and others.
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II.label: item puller Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II.description: An optimized puller that runs at higher speeds. Pulls from input (white cell) to output (yellow cell). Very flexible in its connections.
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Side.label: 물품 방향 전환 배출기
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Side.description: A specialized puller designed to pull items at a 90-degree angle. Functionally similar to the normal puller. Directions can be swapped after placing.
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Wall.label: 내벽 물품 배출기
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Wall.description: 입력 (흰색 칸)에서 출력 (노란색 칸)으로 물품을 배출하는 벽 역할을 하는 특수 물품 배출기입니다. 벽 배출기는 냉동고고에서 사용할 수 있을 정도로 충분히 단열성이 뛰어나고 감옥에서 사용할 수 있을 정도로 충분히 견고합니다.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_I.label: 컨베이어 벨트
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_I.description: An industrial-grade assembly belt used for the transportation of items in a specific direction to a specific location. Useful for automatically hauling products without having your colonists do it themselves. It will dump into storage or stockpiles - or just leave stuff on the ground when the belts end. Because they are rather unsophisticated, they will happily dump whatever they have off the end if there is room.\nA corner can be made by leading the belt into the side of another belt and it will seamlessly continue.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_II.label: fast conveyor belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_II.description: 두 배의 속도로 운반되는 컨베이어 벨트의 업그레이드 버전. 표준 벨트와 유사하게 작동하며, 저장고, 저장구역 또는 빈 공간으로 운반합니다.\n끝 부분을 다른 벨트의 측면에 연결하면 원활하게 이동됩니다.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_III.label: express conveyor belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_III.description: 최적의 물류를 위한 고급 컨베이어 벨트로, 3 배의 속도 (또는 이전 버전의 1.5 배)로 이동합니다. 표준 벨트와 유사하게 작동하며, 저장고, 저장구역 또는 빈 공간으로 운반합니다.\n끝 부분을 다른 벨트의 측면에 연결하면 원활하게 이동됩니다.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Wall_I.label: wall belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Wall_I.description: 벽을 통과해 물품을 이동합니다! 이를 사용하여 벽을 가로지르거나 벽을 따라 물품을 이동할 수 있습니다. 아이템이 끝에 닿으면, 그곳이 방이라면 지면을 다 채울 때까지 이동합니다.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_UG_I.label: 지하 벨트
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_UG_I.description: Underground conveyor belts carry items in tunnels under the ground, safely under walls, machines, and other belts without connecting.\nDoes not require an entrance or exit unless it should merge with a standard above-ground belt.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_UG.label: underground belt entrance
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_UG.description: 지상의 컨베이어 벨트를 지하 컨베이어에 연결합니다. 이것은 지하 통로의 입구입니다.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_Floor.label: underground belt exit
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_Floor.descript: 지하 컨베이어 벨트를 지상 컨베이어에 연결합니다. 이것은 지상으로 내보내는 출구이며, 컨베이어가 없으면 바닥에 물건을 떨어뜨립니다.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_I.label: 컨베이어 분할기
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_I.description: An automated unit that directs items on a conveyor belt in different directions depending on filters, handled by a very basic AI. If no filters are set, it will simply split where items passing through go. Directions in settings are output and must be enabled.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_UG.label: 지하 분할기
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_UG.description: A subterranean conveyor splitter. Functions similarly to an above-ground splitter, minus the mess.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_Wall.label: 벽 분배기
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_Wall.description: A conveyor splitter built into the walls. Functions similarly to standard splitters, connecting to above-ground belts.
LanguageData.PRF_MineShaft.label: 채굴 축
LanguageData.PRF_MineShaft.description: An early mine shaft entrance, which lets you set a target mine operation where a pawn will go into the mountain and mine out what you desire. It also has a slim chance of finding rare/junk bonus items while operating.\nShould be placed in a mountain wall to operate.
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkI.label: auger drill
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkI.description: 바위 덩어리, 재료 및 부품을 포함하여 땅에서 지속적으로 자원을 추출하는 초기 자동화 채석장. 대략 8시간마다 한 번씩 무작위 자원을 생성합니다.\n\n경고: 자동 채광 작업으로 인해 해당 위치에 곤충 군락이 발생할 수 있습니다!
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkII.label: pulse drill Mk.I
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkII.description: 바위 덩어리, 재료 및 부품을 포함하여 땅에서 지속적으로 자원을 추출하는 초기 자동화 채석장. 대략 3시간마다 한 번씩 무작위 자원을 생성합니다.\n\n경고: 자동 채광 작업으로 인해 해당 위치에 곤충 군락이 발생할 수 있습니다!
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkIII.label: pulse drill Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkIII.description: The most advanced form of the automated quarry, this device uses advanced techniques to safely mine without drawing the attention of insectoids. It will also only produce valuable minerals, never stone.
LanguageData.PRF_BillTypeMiner_I.label: plasma drill
LanguageData.PRF_BillTypeMiner_I.description: With highly advanced spacer technology auto mining has been made more precise than ever, and you can now adjust what ores to mine for and even balance power for speed. It will set the primary ore type and receive occasional bonuses in the form of rare ores and junk.
LanguageData.PRF_WallLight.label: 벽 램프
LanguageData.PRF_WallLight.description:
An electrical wall lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.

These lamps are unlike other wall lamps, multisided and atlased to fit different walls.
Good for small rooms or other tightly packed spaces.
You may change the color if you've researched colored lights.
LanguageData.PRF_SunWallLight.label: sun wall lamp
LanguageData.PRF_SunWallLight.description: 농작물을 키울 수 있을 만큼 밝게 비춰주지만 전력을 많이 소모하는 산업용 벽등. 밤에는 자동으로 꺼집니다.
LanguageData.PRF_IndustrialLamp.label: industrial lamp
LanguageData.PRF_IndustrialLamp.description: A powerful electric lamp that lights a wide area.\nThis lamp lights up a huge area both indoors and outdoors to light up your factory hall.\nYou may change the color if you've researched colored lights.
LanguageData.PRF_Floorspotlight.label: floor spotlight
LanguageData.PRF_Floorspotlight.description: An electrical lamp that lights an area.\nThis lamp works both inside and outside.\nComes in colored variants if you've researched colored lights.
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafterSimple.label: S.A.L assembler Mk.I
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafterSimple.description: 기술 레벨 5까지의 다양한 계획서를 제작할 수 있는 1세대 S.A.L 자동 조립기. 이 기계는 예술 작품도 만들 수 있지만 기술이 극히 제한적입니다.\n이 기계를 사용하려면 조립기의 화살표를 작업대의 상호 작용 위치를 향하게 놓기만 하면 됩니다.
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafter.label: S.A.L assembler Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafter.description: The Mark II auto-assembler is the backbone of Project S.A.L, a small but powerful building capable of autonomously crafting recipes. Although more advanced than the basic model with a crafting skill of 12, any art produced by this device is still very basic.
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMachine.label: S.A.L art machine Mk.I
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMachine.description: A specially designed auto crafter that uses heuristic algorithms to produce moderately skilled art at a pace no human could ever match - it pumps out art like a firehose pumps out water.
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMaster.label: S.A.L art machine Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMaster.description: A highly advanced auto-crafter that uses a database of several thousand years of artistic expression to produce master quality art at an absurd pace - a volcanic explosion of art!
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssembler.label: S.A.L overclocked assembler
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssembler.description: An auto-assembler which has been modified to emphasize speed over quality. Any random idiot in your colony could do better, but this machine works at a ridiculous rate and never takes breaks.
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssemblerII.label: S.A.L overclocked assembler Mk.II
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssemblerII.descripti: An advanced overclocked auto-assembler that puts Henry Ford's production lines to shame. The quality is a joke, but it can do the work of an entire team of morons.\n"So it makes you smarter?" "No, it makes you stupid faster."
LanguageData.PRF_SALAutoCooker.label: S.A.L automated cooker
LanguageData.PRF_SALAutoCooker.description: 자동조립기가 적당한 수준의 요리를 수행하지만, 이 특수 자동조리기는 식품 생산에서는 더 빠르고 정확합니다.
LanguageData.PRF_SALAutoMinerI.label: S.A.L automated miner
LanguageData.PRF_SALAutoMinerI.description: A modified crafter that is capable of performing high-level mining operations, most useful in front of a deep-core miner.
LanguageData.PRF_GodlyCrafter.label: S.A.L prime crafter
LanguageData.PRF_GodlyCrafter.description: A device to make even the Archotechs sit up and blink, the Godly S.A.L crafter works so quickly it defies all rationality. Perfect for mass-producing high-quality items, this device is probably as valuable as the rest of your colony combined. May or may not incinerate the universe.\nThis might be the first step into insanity?!#...
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_I.label: 작은 나무상자
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_I.description: 8개의 물품을 저장할 수 있는 작고 단순한 상자입니다. 상자에 보관된 아이템은 변질되지 않습니다.
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_II.label: 나무상자
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_II.description: 16칸까지 저장할 수 있는 거대한 상자입니다. 상자에 저장된 물품은 변질되지 않습니다.
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_I.label: 작은 강철상자
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_I.description: 32칸까지 저장할 수 있는 작은 강철 상자입니다. 상자에 저장된 물품은 변질하지 않습니다.
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_II.label: 강철상자
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_II.description: 64칸까지 저장할 수 있는 거대한 상자입니다. 상자에 저장된 물품은 변질되지 않습니다.
LanguageData.PRF_DigitalStorageUnit_I.label: 디지털 스토리지
LanguageData.PRF_DigitalStorageUnit_I.description: A matter-energy conversion-based storage unit that can hold up to 768 stacks, consuming 10 W of power per stack of items. In the event of a power outage, items already inside will be safe, but the DSU will not be able to store more. Don't break it.
LanguageData.PRF_ColdStorageUnit_I.label: archival storage unit
LanguageData.PRF_ColdStorageUnit_I.description: A matter-energy conversion-based storage unit that can hold up to 10k stacks, consuming 10 W of power per stack of items. In the event of a power outage, items already inside will be safe, but the archival storage unit will not be able to store more. Don't break it.\n\nItems stored in this device are not spawned and therefore won't be automatically accessible by your pawns. Use I/O ports to interact with it.
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_I.label: 입출력 포트
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_I.description: An advanced connection port for the digital storage unit. It can be set to input/output from any platform remotely within the map.
LanguageData.PRF_IOPPusher_I.label: 입/출력 배출기
LanguageData.PRF_IOPPusher_I.description: This modified I/O port allows you to push items directly into the next cell, onto a belt, or anywhere else, saving space instead of using a puller.\nMore of an output port than input/output.
LanguageData.PRF_ItemSlide.label: item chute
LanguageData.PRF_ItemSlide.description: This belt chute/hopper is used for pawns or drones to fill a facing belt without the need for a stockpile and a puller. Basically, it's a small stockpile that automatically pushes onto a belt.
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_II.label: advanced I/O port
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_II.description: An interactive connection port for the digital storage unit. Pawns may request any item from the connected digital storage unit.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampArrow.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampArrow.label: yellow floor sign arrow
LanguageData.PRF_RedFloorLampArrow.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_RedFloorLampArrow.label: red floor sign arrow
LanguageData.PRF_GreenFloorLampArrow.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_GreenFloorLampArrow.label: green floor sign arrow
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampX.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampX.label: red floor sign X
LanguageData.PRF_FloorInput.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorInput.label: input sign
LanguageData.PRF_FloorOutput.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorOutput.label: output sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconClothes.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconClothes.label: clothes sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconSkull.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconSkull.label: skull sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconToxic.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconToxic.label: toxic sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconPower.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconPower.label: power sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGears.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGears.label: gears sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGun.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGun.label: gun sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGasmask.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGasmask.label: gasmask sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconFire.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconFire.label: heat sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconCold.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconCold.label: cold sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconDanger.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconDanger.label: danger sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconExit.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconExit.label: exit sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconPrison.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconPrison.label: prison sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconResearch.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconResearch.label: research sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconHospital.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconHospital.label: hospital sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconBarbedWire.description: A weak fluorescent sign that can be placed on floors or on top of machines or other buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_IconBarbedWire.label: barbed wire sign
LanguageData.PRF_RoboticArm.label: 로봇 팔
LanguageData.PRF_RoboticArm.description: 자동화 건물 건설에 필요한 전동 로봇 팔. 로봇 기계 작업대에서 제작할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_I.label: basic AI chip
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_I.description: 가장 기초적인 AI가 포함되어 있어 초기 기계나 로봇에 사용되는 텐서 처리 장치입니다.
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_II.label: advanced AI core
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_II.description: An advanced processing unit containing hi-tech AI, which is used for advanced machines and robots.
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_III.label: qubit processor
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_III.description: 양자 컴퓨팅에서 쿼빗 또는 양자 비트는 양자 정보의 기본 단위이며, 2가지 상태를 물리적으로 실현한 고전적인 이진 비트의 양자 버전입니다. 쿼빗은 양자역학의 특수성을 보여주는 가장 간단한 양자 시스템 중 하나인 2가지 상태 양자역학 시스템입니다.
LanguageData.PRF_DroneModule.label: UAV (packed)
LanguageData.PRF_DroneModule.description: An unmanned aerial vehicle capable of fulfilling simple tasks. Will need to be installed in a drone station in order to get the right programming installed.
LanguageData.PRF_DataDisk.label: audio tape reel
LanguageData.PRF_DataDisk.description: A roll of magnetic tape. Apparently, it can hold 64 megabytes. How primitive... It's used to create recipe databases for PRF machines.
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_I.label: 작은 기계 구조
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_I.description: 자동화 건물 건설에 사용되는 작지만 간단한 기계 구조
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_II.label: medium machine frame
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_II.description: 더 복잡하고 더 큰 기계의 건설에 사용되는 중형 기계 구조.
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_III.label: advanced machine frame
LanguageData.PRFDrone.label: 드론
LanguageData.PRFDrone.tools.0.label: 머리
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_IFridge.label: fridge I/O port
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_IFridge.description: An advanced connection port for the digital storage unit. It can be set to input/output from any DSU remotely within the map. This version interfaces with Simple Utilities: Fridge branded coolers.
LanguageData.PRFCoolDSU.label: refrigerated digital storage unit
LanguageData.PRFCoolDSU.description: An Owlchemist branded, refrigerated version of the digital storage unit that stores up to 512 stacks of food. Consumes 10 W of power per stack of items. In the event of a power outage, items already inside will be safe, but the DSU will not be able to store more.
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_30k.label: 회로 차단기 (30k)
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_30k.descriptio: 자동회로 차단기입니다. 30000Wd만큼의 방전을 처리할 수 있으며, 방전시 꺼집니다.
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_300k.label: 회로 차단기 (300k)
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_300k.descripti: 자동회로 차단기입니다. 300000Wd만큼의 방전을 처리할 수 있으며, 방전시 꺼집니다.
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperAtomic.label: mini RimAtomic station
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperAtomic.description: A mini atomic workshop helper for RimAtomics to maintain and fuel your reactors; it can flick, haul, handle nuclear tasks, and firefight.
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperFishing.label: mini fishing station
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperFishing.description: A mini fishing station capable of helping you with catching fish. It will take breaks to prevent circuits from getting too wet.
LanguageData.PRF_T1_Aquaculture.label: automated fish farm (freshwater)
LanguageData.PRF_T1_Aquaculture.description: 민물낚시를 하는 자동낚시 기계. 이 기계를 사용하려면, 간단하게 계획서를 넣으면 작업을 수행합니다.
LanguageData.PRF_T2_Aquaculture.label: automated fish farm (saltwater)
LanguageData.PRF_T2_Aquaculture.description: 바다낚시를 하는 자동낚시 기계. 이 기계를 사용하려면, 간단하게 계획서를 넣으면 작업을 수행합니다.
LanguageData.PRF_FishFood.label: 물고기 사료
LanguageData.PRF_FishFood.description: Animal feed made from mixed meat and plant sources, used for feeding fish in tanks. Humanoids should not eat this.
